pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Bio-Tech Restore Oil 80ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schwarzkopf Bio-Tech Restore Oil Rosehip, Grapeseed And Apricot Kernel Oil repairs, nourishes and adds shine.

Powered by the science of nature, BIO-TECH RESTORE OIL, provides repair, protection and nourishment deep into the hair. The hair is left feeling smooth and soft.

+ Antioxidant.
+ Rosehip oil.
+ Grapeseed oil.
+ Apricot Kernel oil.

- Artificial colourants.
- Parabens.

Suitable For: Daily use.

Product Claims: 0% artificial colourants.

Size: 80mL

Hair Type: All Types

Ingredients

Cyclomethicone, Dimethicone, Parfum (Fragrance), Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Benzyl Salicylate, Alpha-lsomethyl lonone, Geraniol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Limonene, Citronellol, Coumarin, Thermus Thermophillus Ferment, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Tocopherol.

Directions

Use sparingly (1-2 pumps) on the mid-lengths and ends of the hair. Use on towel-dried or dry hair. Leave in.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
